page.title: 16Sport at Glenalmond
page.content:
There is a wide variety of sports open to pupils, due to the extensive facilities. The major sports are Rugby and Cricket, but minor sports include Squash, Tennis, Swimming, Basketball, Shooting and Athletics.
Rugby is played from September to March and is compulsory for all boys. There are fourteen teams, which practise every weekday and play matches on Saturdays and some Tuesdays. There are similar arrangements for Cricket, but it is only compulsory for junior boys, and there are far fewer teams for that reason. Nearly every minor sport has a team, and a few fixtures are played. The exception is hockey, which has almost as many fixtures as the major sports.
